meanings.definition: Showing great skill or talent in a particular art form.
meanings.sent1: The painter was the artiest person in the whole art class.
meanings.sent2: She is known as the artiest musician in town.
meanings.sent3: The artiest chef in the restaurant always creates delicious dishes.
meanings.sent4: Her dance moves were the artiest I had ever seen.
meanings.sent5: The artiest sculpture in the exhibit left everyone in awe.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the creation or appreciation of art.
meanings.sent1: The artiest event of the year was the art exhibition.
meanings.sent2: She had the artiest taste in paintings among her friends.
meanings.sent3: The artiest decorations at the party made it truly special.
meanings.sent4: His artiest photographs captured the beauty of nature perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The artiest museum in the city houses priceless artworks.

meanings.definition: The superlative form of the adjective 'arty', meaning having a pretentious or affected artistic style.
meanings.sent1: She was labeled as the artiest in the group due to her exaggerated artistic expressions.
meanings.sent2: The artiest at the gallery always wore eccentric outfits.
meanings.sent3: The artiest at the party kept talking about abstract concepts no one understood.
meanings.sent4: His reputation as the artiest in town was well-known for his unconventional art.
meanings.sent5: The artiest in the class always tried to impress others with his avant-garde ideas.
